Generated Narrative: CodeSystem procedure-type

Profile: Shareable CodeSystem

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/procedure-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
principal Principal procedureThe principal procedure is the procedure performed for definitive treatment most related to the principal diagnosis.
procedure-requiring-anesthesia Procedure requiring anesthesiaA procedure requiring anesthesia.

concept.definition: The principal procedure is the procedure performed for definitive treatment most related to the principal diagnosis.
